打完教学关，感觉自己是爱因斯坦转世。
让我十分惊喜的是，单纯的解谜游戏居然会有剧情和紧张感十足的最终boss关。通关时间在四小时左右。
我果然是爱因斯坦转世。

很好的解谜游戏，一边解开一个个小谜题的同时，更大的黑幕也慢慢显露的那种感觉很好。
虫洞的创意很新颖，虽然刚玩的时候还有些摸不着头脑，但渐渐明白时空跳跃的机制后真的玩得很带感~
每个关卡都设计的很有心意，让人想要一口气玩到通关~
唯一的不足，大概只有流程比较短吧。。。六七个小时就通关了
PS：最后结尾曲AI小姐姐唱的歌太可爱了~

Oldukça keyifli vakit geçirten, eğlenceli olduğu kadar zekayı geliştiren Valve yapımı enfes bir oyun.

[h1]Cake is a lie![/h1]
[b]Игра проходиться на одном дыхании![/b]
Думаю данный шедевр нельзя обойти стороной , так как он зацепит вас за самое сердце [spoiler]в конце сюжета[/spoiler] , а также тут до жути приятная музыка. Цель игры решать головоломки с порталами [spoiler]либо дурачиться с порталами[/spoiler] , и эти головоломки будут всё сложнее и будут требовать от вас хитрых умозаключений , а уровни по мере продвижения будут всё атмосфернее и атмосфернее... Игра радует глаз и не чуточку не лагает , хотя выглядить востребованной по плану железа , но таковой не является. По мере всего проходжения вас будет сопровождать голос [i]GLaDOS[/i] , который будет вас больше забавлять , чем раздрожать. И в заключение хочу сказать , что вы не чуточку не пожалеете купив эту игру , так как она хороша в плане геймплея , и в плане сюжета.
[u]10 кубов из 10![/u]
Sono veramente euforico

PORTAL: the game of which I've watched numerous animations and comics and know many puns, but never played beginning to end.

PRO'S:
Interesting, non-repeating puzzles
Replayability (I still need to get that camera shy achievement)
GladOS commenting on your upcomming death
Achievements that you understand the meaning of only after you get them
Advanced chambers, which are sooooo hard, but also gives a very rewarding feeling upon completion
The 2nd credits that I've watched fully through. +r3p song and ASCII art
The feeling when you realise all turret voices and the radio song are motives from credits' song

CON'S:
No co-op mode
Definitely one of the best games i've ever played.Sure it's a little short, but that doesn't stop it from being a great game.

A great example of a great game without needing RPG elements or glorified graphics settings. Just plain physics puzzles with an amusing narration, and I am sure it can make you occupied for some enjoyable hours if you're into physics puzzles that are not frustratingly hard. I finished the main game in about 4.5 hours, but would be probably longer for most. And there're extra challanges to come. 10/10 recommend if you're into the puzzle genre and don't mind the visuals.

刚开始玩这款游戏时，给我一个我在【心慌方】场景中的感觉，按照AI的指引，慢慢进入下一关，但当我从熔炉中逃出生天，我才知道这个游戏的剧情设计是多么的惊艳。当我从熔炉逃出生天，我从AI的语气中感受到了她的无奈，她的愤怒（刚开始玩不知道开字幕，调中文。。。）当我把她的红色眼球摘下，她的愤怒真的让我害怕，但我把红色眼球投入熔炉之中，她的言语也着实让我泪目。我知道，你还活着！下一部里，期待和你并肩作战！！！
Pecka, sice krátká, ale výživná.

Pour moi, portal devrait être un "classique" du jeu vidéo, au même titre que star wars est un "classique" cinématographique (remarque je n'ai pas vu star wars...). Le gameplay est innovant, on évolue de salle en salle tout en résolvant de petites énigmes de plus en plus complexes, le tout plongé dans une histoire très peu approfondie et sans réel suspens, mais qui donne envie de jouer à la suite (qui est d'ailleurs bien meilleur que le premier opus). Le seul défaut que je trouve à portal c'est son prix, 10€ pour un jeu que j'ai fini en 2h, même en nous refourguant quelques maps bonus (qui sont juste recyclées sur celles du jeu de base), c'est vraiment trop cher. Achetez portal, mais achetez le en soldes, ce seront mes seuls conseils.

10년전 게임이지만 지금 해도 명작이다. 

플레이 시간 : 약 3시간

가성비 : 보통

몰입도 : 다소 높음 (퍼즐 풀 때는 포탈건 쓰는 재미가 있었는데 스토리 진행까지 더해지니 흥분하면서 하게 된다.)

난이도 : 다소 낮음 (지금까지 했던 퍼즐 게임 중 모든 퍼즐이 빡치지 않고 재미있게 머리 쓰면서 한 게임은 이 게임 하나다.)

10년전 게임이지만 그래픽도 꽤 괜찮다. (9년을 더 거슬러 가면 하프라이프가 있는데 이건 옛날에나 명작이지 지금은 그래픽 똥망겜이니 제발 플레이 영상 보고 사자.) 그저 퍼즐만 있는 게임인 줄 알았는데 도중에 단서가 나오면서 점점 스토리가 드러난다. 아무것도 모르는 초보자도 쉽게 퍼즐을 풀 수 있으며 조금만 머리를 사용한다면 답이 금방 나온다. 조작도 간단하다. 

가끔씩 고전 명작게임이라고 하면 대하소설 정독하는 것처럼 생각할 수 있는데 이 게임은 그런거 아니니까 무조건 추천이다.

참고로 이 게임의 엔딩을 보고나면 게임 시작화면이 바뀐다. (물론 나갔다가 다시 들어가면 원래 시작화면으로 돌아온다.)

As I will admit I did play Portal 2 before the actual original, I will have to say that the first is as good as the second with an amazing storyline and a great gaming series! I would definently recommend this game BEFORE the second one.

This game may be from 2007, but if you haven't played it yet, you're in for a treat.  Portal is a first-person puzzle game, which focuses mostly on logical problem solving  with occasional mechanics that require some reflexes.  Don't mistake it for a shooter based on screenshots.  I found it perfectly paced, introducing new concepts without frustrating "I'm stuck!" moments.  The puzzle solutions are very logical and satisfying, never arbitrary or random.  Combined with an intriguing backstory and humorous dialog, there's good reasons this game is so popular and well rated.  Some might call it a little short, but I found it just right.

I liked this game because of how uniquely presented the story and concept is. I like the fact that you can see through portals and walk through them. This leads to some pretty unique puzzles and challenges, and they are SOLID. The voice acting is very good. This game is one of the best puzzles I have ever played. If you liked this game, try out the sequel, or the Half-Life series which it is partially based on.

咳咳(清一下嗓子)。观众朋友们，手机上的朋友们。(￣^￣゜)尴尬走错片场。
  7块入了传1和传2，打算先把1玩完再和朋友一起玩2…没想到…后面越来越压抑的剧情真的是吓到我了呀！很多时候我都以为自己找到了例外的通道，结果发现不过是主线剧情而已。
  记得倒数第二关把？第一次遇见那个发火箭的机器人…借助火箭打坏传送通道，掉下来一个方块…我脑洞大的以为要进通道…于是我回其他房间找各种凳子椅子箱子一切能垫脚的，好吧我到了地图外…一片白茫茫，我错了，我老实的重新入剧情。
  那个风扇真的是，我第一眼看到风扇是用方块卡主风扇叶然后跳下去，后来发现方块太大，卡不住，于是我就把原来找来的凳子椅子全部搬过来，去卡风扇，然后…然后…就炸了，各种鬼畜…桌子椅子满天飞！火花到处冒啊！(聪(sha)明(bi)的我很(zhong)快(yu)发现风扇下面有个墙可以发传送门呀)，
后面的剧情真的是吓到我了，玩完传送一以后一身汗。我太胆小？

Przyjemna i ciekawa
Short, easy and brilliant. Has aged well.

What the original Portal lacks in length, it makes up for immensely through incredible gameplay and an immersive setting.  Never before has a puzzle game been able to capture players' attentions through both its storyline and presentation.

Taking many of the gameplay elements introduced in Nuclear Monkey's "Narbacular Drop", Valve manages to perfect the formula with the use of their Source engine.  Each test chamber teaches the player a new way to progress the game, making them well prepared for their eventual escape and battle with GLaDOS.

And, while we are on the topic of the world's angriest CPU, let us discuss just how masterful the writing is in this game.  While short, the story of Portal shines almost solely through the game's main antagonist.  With equally eerie and hilarious dialogue, GLaDOS shines as one of the best characters in video game villain history, and the ending fight with her shows her true colors quite epically.

Whether you're a fan of puzzle games, first person shooters, or Valve games, this game was made for you.  On that note, I recommend that everyone should play this small nugget of gold.  The game is fairly cheap (you could buy lunch for more money than this) and goes on sale very frequently.  Don't let this gem fly under your radar!
